dct_description_sm: [Schedel ; cut in wood and illustrated by Michael Wohlgemut].
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography and places of historical interest.
Descriptive text throughout; features illustrations of holy men.
At head of title: Quarta etas mundi -- Foliu XLVIII.
Appears in Schedel's Liber cronicarum. Nuernberg : Anton Koberger, 1493.
